name: Diceyard
description:
Diceyard is a top-down shooter with endless waves of enemies. The twist is that your weapon are magic dice that only kill monsters if its value is just right.

If you want to peek around the source project it can be found here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P2mRHeykErOfQle-bmhgDRmmlkcAZQSm/view?usp=shari...

Credits:
Made for Miz Jam 1
Art kit by Kenney
music from Youtube's audio library
sounds from opengameart.org

Thanks to DungSC127 for testing my game early on.
